Vertica

A E S T H E T I C S

Stepping into the world of eye candy

I made this theme for shits and giggles. I did learn lots about the Tumblr library and I wish Wordpress would be just as simple. This was the project revealed that I really wanted to keep making cool looking websites in the future so this will always be dear to my heart.
